description
================
LEGO Batman: The Videogame is another game where there are the famous building blocks, developed by development studio Traveller's Tales ( having already an excellent series of LEGO Star Wars ) . Edition of this title took the responsibility for the interactive entertainment section corporation Warner Brothers , which Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment ( WBIE ) . The game is available for almost all popular current hardware platforms - both the previous and the current console generation , as well as PCs . Just as it did in LEGO Star Wars , this game also decided to join the world of Danish bricks from another universe - this time fell on the well-known comic books and movies Bat Man .

LEGO Batman: The Video Game can best be described as an action game with elements of adventure . As it often happened in stories involving Batman , Gotham City into chaos . Our goal is to introduce order and crack down on criminals. Somehow escaped from Arkham Asylum for the whole gang known troublemakers include : Joker, Penguin and Two-Face . After our , or Batman's side , will his constant companion and faithful Robin Bruce Wayne's butler , Alfred Pennyworth . Explores built from LEGO world , fighting enemies and solve simple puzzles logic (for example, by building various structures , including vehicles of Human Bat , such as the Batmobile , but the trap criminals ) .

Dark , satin artwork perfectly captures the atmosphere of Gotham City, with its sinking in the recesses of the night , cavernous streets with skyscrapers . There are also , of course, the lightning and the full moon, on which the background, to the accompaniment of solemn, symphonic music , we hold many spectacular chases and fights. The fact that we are dealing with legoizacjÃ„â€¦ , gives the game a bit absurd humor and at the same time makes it attractive to a younger audience .

In LEGO Batman: The Videogame is available already proven in LEGO Star Wars co-op mode for two people. Each of the available characters has their own unique abilities that must be used during the game . And as the playable villains are also , in addition to cooperation is also an option duels between players. The game is filled with humor - in the course of numerous cut-scenes do not hear the characters' voices , and the only funny rumble .
